channel.title: Pm logs and chatlogs
channel.description: I need help adding private message logs to my 317 server, Please i would be thankfull if you help me also, with adding chatlogs to it. i have tried using the search button but couldnt find it... if you could link me to a good tutorial, (besides jangans, because i have problems with his.. i added correct, but when someone says something in chat for example ":p" it says like... some weird thing like oe or something. anyhow, please if you could give me the codes to add, like a short tutorial, would be great! for chatlogs and pm logs plox? thankshh yooh haha

item.title: Pm logs and chatlogs
item.dc:creator: @BubbleScape_x BubbleScape x
item.description:
@BubbleScape_x wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:4, topic:349072”]Then don’t double post.
and your only allowed one account per ip.[/quote]Then i would like that account deleted, plox! maybe ill do something rlly rlly bad to get it banned >.> no really, that was my really old account and i forgot about it :o
